subtitleNullable: predict student engagement in online classes
descriptionNullable:
### Context
Detecting engagement among students in online classes using facial recognition. This dataset has considered pictures of students taken using laptop cameras during online classes and their various facial emotions.

### Content
It consists of two main classes
**Engaged** -  1076 images belonging to 3 different subclasses: confused - 369 images, engaged - 347 images, frustrated - 360 images
**Not Engaged** - 1044 images belonging to 3 different subclasses: Looking away - 423 images, bored - 358 images, drowsy - 263 images
